item.title: King Charles and royal family, minus Andrew, gather for Christmas
item.description: King Charles III led his family to church on foot ahead of his annual Christmas Day speech that is expected to focus on pilgrimage.

item.title: More severe weather in store for a soaked California
item.description: More severe weather is forecast for an already soaked California, raising risk of additional mudslides and debris flows.

item.title: Rescue helicopter crashes on Mount Kilimanjaro
item.description: Two foreigners, a local doctor, a tour guide and the pilot were killed in the helicopter crash on Mount Kilimanjaro.

item.title: Celebrating 40 magical years of Chris Van Allsburg's "The Polar Express"
item.description: This year marks the 40th anniversary of Chris Van Allsburg's beloved children's book, "The Polar Express." He tells CBS News' Bradley Blackburn about ...

item.title: $1.8 billion Christmas Eve Powerball jackpot won by single ticket sold in Arkansas
item.description: The Christmas Eve Powerball jackpot worth $1.817 billion, the second-largest ever, was won by a single ticket sold in Arkansas.
